name: Dispatch Notification
response:
Dispatch Notification

Details:

Customer's Name {{ customer }}
Contact's Name {{ first_name }} {{ last_name }}
Address Name {{ address }}
Address Details {{ customer_address }}
Order Number {{ delivery_note }}
Order Total {{ grand_total }}
Departure Time {{ departure_time }}
Estimated Arrival {{ estimated_arrival }}
Driver's Name {{ driver_name }}
Driver's Number {{ cell_number }}
Vehicle Number {{ vehicle }}
subject: Your order is out for delivery!

name: Leave Approval Notification
response:
Leave Application Notification

Details:

Employee{{employee_name}}
Leave Type{{leave_type}}
From Date{{from_date}}
To Date{{to_date}}
Status{{status}}
Leave Days{{total_leave_days}}

{% set doc_link = frappe.utils.get_url_to_form('Leave Application', name) %}


{{ _('Open Now') }}
subject: Leave Approval Notification

name: Interview Reminder
response:
Interview Reminder

Interview: {{name}} is scheduled on {{scheduled_on}} from {{from_time}} to {{to_time}}
subject: Interview Reminder

name: Interview Feedback Reminder
response:
Interview Feedback Reminder

Interview Feedback for Interview {{ name }} is not submitted yet. Please submit your feedback. Thank you, good day!
subject: Interview Feedback Reminder

name: Exit Questionnaire Notification
response:
Exit Questionnaire


Dear {{ employee_name }},

Thank you for the contribution you have made during your time at {{ company }}. We value your opinion and welcome the feedback on your experience working with us. Request you to take out a few minutes to fill up this Exit Questionnaire. {% set web_form = frappe.db.get_value('HR Settings', 'HR Settings', 'exit_questionnaire_web_form') %} {% set web_form_link = frappe.utils.get_url(uri=frappe.db.get_value('Web Form', web_form, 'route')) %}

{{ _('Submit Now') }}
subject: Exit Questionnaire Notification

name: Interview Invite
response:
Interview Invite

Dear {{ name }},


We are pleased to inform you that you have been shortlisted for an interview for the position of **{{ job_title }}** at **{{ company_name }}**.


Interview Details:  

Interview: {{ name }} is scheduled on {{ scheduled_on }} from {{ from_time }} to {{ to_time }}  

Interview Type: {{ interview_type }}  

{% if location %}Venue / Location: {{ location }}{% endif %}

{% if meeting_link %}Virtual Meeting Link: {{ meeting_link }}{% endif %}


Please ensure that you are available at least 10 minutes before the start time. Kindly have your identification document and any relevant certificates or supporting documents available during the interview.


If you are unable to attend or need to reschedule, please contact us as soon as possible so that we can arrange an alternative time.


We look forward to meeting you.


Kind regards,  

{{ company_name }}  

{% if contact_person %}Contact Person: {{ contact_person }}{% endif %}

{% if contact_phone %}Phone: {{ contact_phone }}{% endif %}

{% if contact_email %}Email: {{ contact_email }}{% endif %}
subject: Applicant Interview Invite
